communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any communications between employees of the California Secretary of State's office and Pamela J. Bondi (pbondi@americafirstpolicy.com) or any other employees of the America First Policy Institute with an email address ending "@americafirstpolicy.com. Please search for records between April 14, 2024 and present date.

Please also search for communications to and from  employees of the California Secretary of State's office containing the term "America First Policy Institute" from April 14, 2024 to present date.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kira Lerner

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any communications between employees of the Arizona Secretary of State's office and Pamela J. Bondi (pbondi@americafirstpolicy.com) or any other employees of the America First Policy Institute with an email address ending "@americafirstpolicy.com. Please search for records between April 14, 2024 and present date.

Please also search for communications to and from  employees of the Arizona Secretary of State's office containing the term "America First Policy Institute" from April 14, 2024 to present date.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Kira Lerner

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Information regarding the Watauga County Health Department's relationship with Samaritan's Purse, including the provision of  vaccinations by Samaritan's Purse to local residents. 
Information regarding contracts between Watauga County Health Department and Samaritan's Purse.
Email correspondence between Samaritan's Purse employees and officials with the Watauga County Health Department.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jonathan Michels

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: NYRA audit records
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All records provided to the State Comptroller's offfice by the New York Racing Association in connection with the audit published January 18, 2024, entitled "Purchasing and Procurement Practices (Follow-Up), " including but not limited to: Bid Exclusion Memos, spreadsheets, purchasing data templates,

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sam Mellins
